mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.* FROM ( SELECT TT1.rnum as num, TT1.title, TT1.categoryNumber, TT1.views, TT1.likes, CASE WHEN TRUNC(TT1.writtenDate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN TO_CHAR(TT1.writtenDate, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(TT1.writtenDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS writtenDate, TT1.nickname, TT1.postNumber FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, t1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM board WHERE categoryNumber = #{categoryNumber} ORDER BY likes DESC ) t1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo}-1)+#{pageSize} ) TT1 WHERE rnum >=#{pageSize} * (#{pageNo}-1)+ 1 ) A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(postNumber) totalCnt FROM board WHERE categoryNumber = #{categoryNumber} ) B
SELECT currentRank, name, previousRank-currentRank as changeRank FROM RANKING WHERE mainCategory = '비제조업' AND ROWNUM <= 12 ORDER BY currentRank ASC

SELECT t1.currentRank as currentRank, t1.name as name, t1.changeRank as changeRank FROM ( SELECT currentRank, name, previousRank - currentRank AS changeRank FROM RANKING WHERE mainCategory = '제조업' AND currentRank BETWEEN 1 AND 12 ORDER BY currentRank ASC )t1 WHERE ROWNUM <= 12
mapper.update: UPDATE Ranking SET currentRank = ( SELECT newRank FROM ( SELECT mainCategory, subCategory, name, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY mainCategory ORDER BY score DESC) AS newRank FROM Ranking ) source WHERE source.mainCategory = Ranking.mainCategory AND source.subCategory = Ranking.subCategory ), rankingUpdate = SYSDATE
